001/** Useful functions and shared state for controllers.
002 * @author Sarah Higdon
003 */
004
005// this is essentially a header file 
006// for useful functions that can be used across multiple controllers
007
008package src.controller;
009
010import javafx.fxml.FXMLLoader;
011import javafx.scene.Node;
012import javafx.scene.Parent;
013import javafx.scene.Scene;
014import javafx.stage.Stage;
015import javafx.event.Event;
016
017
018import java.io.File;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.time.LocalDate;
021
022public class useful_functions {
023
024    // User role enum
025    /**
026     * User roles available to the app.
027     */
028    public enum user_role {
029        NONE,
030        MANAGER,
031        CASHIER
032    }
033    // Global variable to store current user role
034    /**
035     * Global variable storing the current user role.
036     */
037    public static user_role current_user_role = user_role.NONE;
038    // General helper to switch between FXML scenes
039    /**
040     * General helper to switch between FXML scenes.
041     * @param fxml_file - Path to the FXML file to load
042     * @param event - The triggering UI event (used to find the current Stage)
043     */
044    public static void switch_scene(String fxml_file, Event event) {
045        try {
046            File fxml = new File(fxml_file);
047            Parent root = FXMLLoader.load(fxml.toURI().toURL());
048            Stage stage = (Stage) ((Node) event.getSource()).getScene().getWindow();
049            stage.setScene(new Scene(root));
050            stage.show();
051        } catch (IOException e) {
052            e.printStackTrace();
053        }
054    }
055
056    //tracking current name
057    /**
058     * Current user's first name (for display/logging).
059     */
060    public static String current_first_name = "";
061
062    /**
063     * Current user's last name (for display/logging).
064     */
065    public static String current_last_name  = "";
066
067    /**
068     * Sets the current user's first and last name.
069     * @param first - First name
070     * @param last - Last name
071     */
072    public static void set_current_name(String first, String last) {
073        current_first_name = first;
074        current_last_name  = last;
075        System.out.println("current user name set to: " + first + " " + last);
076    }
077
078    //tracking total price of current purchase
079    /**
080     * Running total price for the active purchase/session.
081     */
082    public static double current_total_price = 0.0;
083
084    /**
085     * Gets the current total price.
086     * @return The current total price
087     */
088    public static double get_total_price() { return current_total_price; }
089
090    /**
091     * Sets the current total price.
092     * @param v - New total price value
093     */
094    public static void set_total_price(double v) { current_total_price = v; }
095
096    // setting all values in x report to zero
097    /**
098     * When true, the next X report render should show all zeros (one-time).
099     */
100    public static boolean zero_x_report = false;
101
102    // last date the Z report was run (null if never)
103    /**
104     * The last calendar date a Z report was run (null if never).
105     */
106    public static LocalDate lastZReportRunDate = null;
107
108}
